--- format: html --- # Welcome {.unnumbered} This book provides examples of exposure-response analysis with Bayesian methods. ## Install necessary packages The examples utilizes [`BayesERtools`](https://genentech.github.io/BayesERtools/) package. - Tutorial (This page): - Documentation: - GitHub repo: You can install the package as follows: ``` r # install.packages('BayesERtools') # Once on CRAN devtools::install_github("genentech/BayesERtools") # development version ``` You also need latest version of `rstanemax` (\>= 0.1.7) to use Emax model. ``` r install.packages('rstanemax') ``` ## Model types supported by `BayesERtools`
Binary endpoint
Continuous endpoint
Linear (logit) Emax (logit) Linear Emax
backend rstanarm rstanemax rstanarm rstanemax
